text: Learn to find the elements that you like trading if you take this stuff seriously has a lot of things that can be a drag over time Do you want a bunch of data analysis can be interesting, but it's a lot of work and it can be tedious repetitive not necessarily the most stimulating stuff But one of my favorite things about markets is that you get to learn about new technology new stuff Every single day even as a trader. I'm typically trading much shorter term market sentiment But I care a lot about what kind of companies I'm looking at and it helps me understand the current landscape like right now It's dominated by stuff that you see regarding AI not so long from now you're gonna see more about quantum computing There are really cool things you get to learn and if you find these small pockets that you derive True joy from interacting with then that tedious work starts to fit into the broader picture So find the stuff that you like be an outlier seal later
